title: Texas Skillet
directions: In a large skillet, cook the beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until the meat is no longer pink; drain. Add the beans, tomatoes, chilies, rice, water and seasonings. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for until most of liquid is gone, stirring occasionally.
Transfer to a serving bowl. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Serve with tortilla chips. Yield: 6 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (15 ounces) red or white kidney beans, undrained
2 cans (4 ounces each) chopped green chilies
